tech.ferus.util.config

Class ConfigFile<T extends ninja.leaping.configurate.ConfigurationNode>

  • java.lang.Object
    • tech.ferus.util.config.ConfigFile<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - the type of ConfigurationNode
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    GsonConfigFile, HoconConfigFile, JsonConfigFile, YamlConfigFile

    public class ConfigFile<T extends ninja.leaping.configurate.ConfigurationNode>
extends java.lang.Object
    A wrapper for Configurate's ConfigurationLoader. Allows you to easily get and save data.

      • save

        public boolean save()
        Saves the root ConfigurationNode with the active ConfigurationLoader.

        Does not give exceptions upon failure.

        Returns:
        true if save was successful; false otherwise

      • saveWithException

        public void saveWithException()
                       throws java.io.IOException
        Saves the root ConfigurationNode with the active ConfigurationLoader.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if ConfigurationLoader.save(ConfigurationNode) throws an exception

      • reload

        public boolean reload()
        Reloads the configuration from the ConfigurationLoader.

        Does not give exceptions upon failure.

        Returns:
        true if reload was successful; false otherwise

                         throws java.io.IOException
        Reloads the configuration from the ConfigurationLoader.
        Throws:
